abstract: House Committee on Energy and Commerce, which has jurisdiction over international sports, expresses concerns about alleged systematic doping in Russia and urges International Olympic Committee to combat doping and clean up global sports ahead of 2016 Olympics.

headline.print_headline: House Panel Urges Action on Doping by I.O.C.
headline.main: House Panel Urges I.O.C. to Eradicate Doping

keywords.value: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: In a letter, the House Committee on Energy and Commerce expressed concerns about doping allegations in Russia and conflicts of interest within the global antidoping effort....
lead_paragraph: In a letter, the House Committee on Energy and Commerce expressed concerns about doping allegations in Russia and conflicts of interest within the global antidoping effort.
